unnormalised: Arrey bhai, India vs. Pak toh nail-biting tha! Virat scored 85 runs, not out. And Jadeja took 2 wickets. Scoreboard showed India needing 15 off the last over, tension was real! Final score India 160/3, Pak 155 all out. What a match!
normalised: Arrey bhai, India versus Pak toh nail-biting tha! Virat scored eighty five runs, not out. And Jadeja took two wickets. Scoreboard showed India needing fifteen off the last over, tension was real! Final score India one hundred and sixty divided by three, Pak one hundred and fifty five all out. What a match!
